input.sentences: the fall was starting off wonderfully .
they were very excited to go to the craft fair .
finally | they looked at the necklaces .
output.sentences: Fall is the best time of year.
The crisp weather and all the excitement around Halloween make autumn my favorite season.
My mother and I make jewelry and sell it in the fall.
We make earrings, bracelets, necklaces, and other pieces upon request.
We love to travel the country selling jewelry in harvest festivals.
